title: I genuinely feel bad for any nice people who main...
body:
{{champion:92}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:20}} 

Everyone just assumes you are an asshole from the start of the game.
Just throwing it out there.

(Sorry if I missed any)

replies.body: where is shaco?
He was invisible

Teemo and Shaco do not deserve to be on the list, to be honest. 'Asshole' is not accurate enough for them. 'Demostration of physical manifestation of psychical torture aiming to the deepest core of your remaining sanity' fits better.

One game i got a vayne that went 1/5 and she wrote:
"sorry Taric, u played really well but i fcked our lane"
I was like O.o
If only i took screenshoot :/.

>...i got a vayne that went 1/5 and she wrote:
"...i fcked our lane"

Wait, a _Vayne_ wrote that!? :O

I'm sorry, friend, but that's called "a dream" (would explain why you got no screenshot). :)
Still, I'll rate it 8 for effort and wishful thinking.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I know I'm a sht vayne, so when I do bad with her I know, but I can catch up most of the time

Well I got the Gosu complex when I have to play Vayne.

That means feed early, then farm till minute 40 and in the end get carried or carry (with a 99/1 ratio)
i main, lee sin, riven , zed , yas, vayne, what does that make me?
Well, I mean, the name....
https://i.imgflip.com/7zzwy.jpg

I feel bad for the champions themselves that they have the image now of only being played by assholes.

Riven seems like she would be super chill to hang with to be honest.
Vayne seems about as uptight as her toxic mains IMO. She's a bit too serious.
Her parents were killed when she was a child and she hunts evil creatures, can't blame her
Batman still parties, I think she can lighten up a bit

{{champion:126}} personality is pretty much(a bit more serious though)
http://cdn.myanimelist.net/s/common/uploaded_files/1441294828-ca1400c9fb46bbcf3e95bc9f41ed7170.jpeg
Arrogant but overall a nice guy.
Jayce definitely seems like the kind of guy who shoved nerds (Viktor) into lockers in high school.
And then gets praised for it.

And despite getting straight A's he gets all the girls. 

Fuck, Jayce is basically the cool kid that has never had anything bad happen to him. Usual characterization involves seeing that his family life is in shambles or having him lose everything.
http://img08.deviantart.net/d403/i/2016/108/9/1/lol__riven___happy_birthday_gimper___by_lexlexia-d9zchr8.png

For anybody wondering:

The text on the right _"Wszystkiego Najlepszego"_ means _"All the best"_ in Polish, but at the same time it is the equivalent of _"Happy"_ in _"Happy Birthday"_ and usually the _"Birthday"_ part is implied.
When it isn't implied, the longer form is _"Wszystkiego najlepszego z okazji urodzin"_, which translates to _"All the best (to you) on the occasion of your birthday"_... or in English "Happy Birthday".

The moment you pick one of those champs you have taken your first step to the dark side.  Some of you will realize your error and turn back.   Some of you will flirt with the darkness from time to time but never fully commit out of prudence or fear.

But some.... some will give in to the darkest urges of their souls and will main these champions for the power.  To bask in hatred.  To thumb their nose at decency and humanity and give in to the blackest of sin.  Do not cry for these people.  Only learn from them, and know how far you can sink if you delve too deep into certain unwholesome champions.  Be wary.  Be afraid.


~A Teemo main.

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/17/176b9ce52f81f8fd4138893ee0250b89174a93ead7f920c1dbd556687d649e8f.jpg

I feel bad for the enemy.

I don't think Jayce players are assholes. They usually don't talk (unless you're talking about the new influx of Jayce players who aren't mains).

Most Lee's are bad but not toxic.

Darius mains are really similar to Jayce imo.
most riven players are toxic because they are bad at riven (myself included lol). Seriously that champ is way harder than people give her credit for.

I'm still kind of fresh to Riven. (I'm usually a pretty chill Ashe main.) But one game I was carrying and the enemy was bitching about me playing a "faceroll" champ in all chat. I was like, have you even played Riven?
heh a pretty CHILL ashe main, heh
You forgot {{champion:105}} feelsbadman

I remember when {{champion:11}} used to be the Toxic-main King... 

FeelsBadMan for the new toxic King/Queens :'(
mainly with riven, if you do even mildly bad with riven you get the "typical riven player" comments and team will flame u into tilting
I main both Yasuo and Zed and  I am not the slightest bit toxic. Although I agree, Zed and Yasuo players are, majority of the time, assholes.

{{champion:64}} players aren't assholes they just all suck. like really bad lol

the rest of the champs definitely earned their reputation though.
i would add {{champion:75}} {{champion:27}}. nasus players are selfish children(in general) that will never communicate or help their team and i honestly don't know why they play the game half the time since they can get the exact same gameplay from a custom game by themselves. singed players are literal cancer and most of the times it's for their own team. one out of like 50 singes will be cancer for the enemy team lol

Singed main here.  Singed mains play by very different rules.  Make sure you understand what those rules are before you blame us for things.  Our job is to distract the enemy team and waste as much of their time as is possible.  Your job while a singed is on your team is to pretend top lane doesn't exist and to take something every time 4 people spend a minute chasing us.

Some examples of things people should do while their singed is being chased in circles top:

-Eat the entire bot side jungle
-push minions into the tower so that the enemy laner who roams loses more gold in minions than they get for using their ult to kill an 0/5 singed.  (It just takes one wave.  Seriously.  Not hard.)
-take towers of enemy laners who roam.
-take a dragon every time the enemy jungler has to recall because they chased singed.  Whether or not they get the kill they will be recalling.
-junglers can gank mid and not with no fear of counter ganks when the enemy jungler is chasing singed.

What do people on my team usually do while 4 people on the enemy team chase me and waste all their ults and summoners for a worthless kill?

-flame me in chat while standing still and wasting time.
-say, "gg s@20"
-freeze the enemy minion wave in fromt of their tower and CS poorly.
-spam pings on top of me and not CS at all.
-roam top to try and, "help," me and feed kills that are actually worth gold.
-junglers take their own wraiths and pretend nothing is happening.

Hope this helps you understand how to play (and win) with us on your team.
I am a jungler who puts a high priority on dragon. I love seeing a good singed. At the start of the game I tell them if they can pull the enemy jungler ill give them a dragon
Good stuff.  I love junglers like you.

It truly is sad how few people know how to play with a singed. If you see your Singed getting chased around top lane and your first response is to go 'help him' you have just thrown away everything he just offered to the team. Is dragon up? Go take it. Is Bot lane gankable? Go make it a 3v2 with no chance of enemy jungler counter ganking. Repeat process for mid lane. None of the above? Go steal his bot jungle. For the love of god do not go top unless there is literally nothing else to do on the map.

{{champion:27}} is fun though
gotta love the proxy

as you need to be careful, and keep farming, so you dont fall behind

There were lots of times when I got comments like "gg we lost", "typical Yasuo", "another shitty Yasuo", when I highlight {{champion:157}}  before the bans. Most of the time I ignore them, but it gets irritating after a while.

No joke, I played with two really chill Zed players in the past week. It was so jarring not having him scream and trash-talk our team the whole game... He even said my Nami was godlike. I half expected to wake up in a cold sweat lol

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Troubles

No chat bans, temp bans, perma bans, no int feeding (I just suck REALLY hard sometimes XD), and no intentional afking. Only thing I've ever been punished with is Low Priority Queue because my comp is old af and crashes in load screen way more than I'd like it to. 

Make people assume I'm an asshole because of the champs I play, and prove them wrong by being a nice person. :)
people think I main {{champion:103}}  because I'm obsessed with Naruto :/

i cant tell if you're an ahri main, and the misconseption is that you're obsessed with naruto
or if you are obsessed with naruto, and the misconseption is that you must main ahri.

there's only one option worthy of obsession of the two

One gives you nothing but filler and the other dares you to fill'er
